name: Perfect Skincare
description:
Help your clients feel great in their own skin as they step back into a world of relaxation.

Specialising in facials this spa is the talk of the town. Using organic and natural ingredients to create state of the art face masks, pick from a variety of different tools to help you pop those pesky pimples, and apply face serum to leave your clients with a fresh clean feel.
Looks like you have a queue of people waiting at your door, time to get on your gloves and start your treatments.

Perfect Skincare features:
-Help your clients with their skin troubles
-Use a variety of techniques and tools
-Pop pimples and annoying blackheads
-Apply organic and natural facemasks
-Provide the best spa treatments
